overview:
Rudy Triana has always been fascinated by innovation for as long as he can remember. He’s a multi-faceted creative artist from Southwest Florida who specialized years in trades such as Fashion/Commercial Photography, Web Design, App Development and more.

Not expecting what potential he had, At the age of 18 he created an e-commerce online store for his mother (giftsbasketsetc.com ) grossing an average 80k-100k* a year.

Fascinated by the success of his mother’s website, he continued to pursue into his own innovative ventures and in 2012 launched his very own App Development Company, Appizon.com
